org.apache.nutch.plugin

Interface Pluggable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FieldFilter, HtmlParseFilter, IndexingFilter, OnlineClusterer, Ontology, Parser, Protocol, QueryFilter, ResponseWriter, ScoringFilter, Summarizer, URLFilter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutomatonURLFilter, BasicIndexingFilter, BasicQueryFilter, BasicSummarizer, CCIndexingFilter, CCParseFilter, CCQueryFilter, Clusterer, DateQueryFilter, ExtParser, FieldQueryFilter, File, Ftp, HTMLLanguageParser, HtmlParser, Http, Http, HttpBase, JSParseFilter, LanguageIndexingFilter, LanguageQueryFilter, LuceneSummarizer, MoreIndexingFilter, MSBaseParser, MSExcelParser, MSPowerPointParser, MSWordParser, NutchAnalyzer, NutchDocumentAnalyzer, OntologyImpl, OOParser, OPICScoringFilter, PdfParser, PrefixURLFilter, RawFieldQueryFilter, RegexURLFilter, RegexURLFilterBase, RelTagIndexingFilter, RelTagParser, RelTagQueryFilter, RSSParser, ScoringFilters, SiteQueryFilter, SWFParser, TextParser, TypeQueryFilter, URLQueryFilter, ZipParser

    public interface Pluggable
    Defines the capability of a class to be plugged into Nutch. This is a common interface that must be implemented by all Nutch Extension Points.
    Author:
    Jérôme Charron
    See Also:
    About Plugins, plugin package description
